definitions.definition: Truth , indeed , that is the truth! The shortened form of the statement "My word is my bond."
examples: "Yo, that movie was epic!" / " Word ?" ("You speak the truth?") / " Word ." ("I speak the truth.")

definitions.definition: An abbreviated form of word up ; a statement of the acknowledgment of fact with a hint of nonchalant approval.

main_definition: ( slang ) Truth , indeed , that is the truth! The shortened form of the statement "My word is my bond."
secondary_definitions: ( slang , emphatic , stereotypically African-American Vernacular ) An abbreviated form of word up ; a statement of the acknowledgment of fact with a hint of nonchalant approval.
